docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 1--It was persistently reported here all afternoon but not satisfactorily confirmed late tonight that a large German warship, accompanied by two submarines, had been sighted off the coast of the Brazilian State  of Rio...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 1--It was persistently reported here all afternoon but not satisfactorily confirmed late tonight that a large German warship, accompanied by two submarines, had been sighted off the coast of the Brazilian State of Rio Grande do Sul this morning headed south.
docs.abstract: German warship and 2 U-boats reptd off Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil; Montevideo repts battle off Cape Polonio; Brit and French warships reptd seen off Uruguay

headline.main: Big Reich Warship and 2 U-Boats Are Reported Off Southern Brazil Three British and Two French Vessels Are Said to Be Off Uruguay Ready to Fight-- Montevideo Hears a Battle Is On

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 2--The British freighter Southgate, which radioed yesterday evening that she had been attacked by a submarine about 130 miles northeast of San Juan, Puerto Rico, was located today by naval planes. These reported that the ship was in...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 2--The British freighter Southgate, which radioed yesterday evening that she had been attacked by a submarine about 130 miles northeast of San Juan, Puerto Rico, was located today by naval planes. These reported that the ship was in "no apparent danger."
docs.abstract: U S planes sight Southgate; rept it unharmed; Germany denies attempt at attack; Repr H Fish charges propaganda
